titles.title: To provide rental assistance to low-income tenants in certain multifamily rural housing projects financed by the Rural Housing Service of the Department of Agriculture, and to develop and implement a plan for preserving the affordability of rural rental housing, and for other purposes.
Strategy and Investment in Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
